description: Perform advanced mathematical computations including numerical and symbolic calculations, and generate various types of plots. Leverage integrations with NumPy, SymPy, and Matplotlib to handle algebra, calculus, linear algebra, statistics, and data visualization tasks efficiently. Enhance your workflows with a powerful MCP server tailored for mathematical and plotting operations.

configSchema.description: No configuration needed for Fermat MCP server

capabilities.name: mpl_mcp_plot_scatter
capabilities.description: Plots scatter chart of given datavalues

capabilities.name: mpl_mcp_plot_chart
capabilities.description: Plots line/scatter/bar chart of given datavalues

capabilities.name: mpl_mcp_plot_stem
capabilities.description: Plots stem chart of given datavalues

capabilities.name: mpl_mcp_plot_stack
capabilities.description: Plots stacked area/bar chart of given datavalues

capabilities.name: numpy_mcp_numerical_operation
capabilities.description: Do numerical operation like add, sub, mul, div, power, abs, exp, log, sqrt, sin, cos, tan, mean, median, std, var, min, max, argmin, argmax, percentile, dot, matmul, inv, det, eig, solve, svd

capabilities.name: numpy_mcp_matlib_operation
capabilities.description: Do matrix operations: rand-mat, zeros, ones, eye, identity, arange, linspace, reshape, flatten, concatenate, transpose, stack

capabilities.name: sympy_mcp_algebra_operation
capabilities.description: Do algebraic operations like simplify, expand, factor, collect

capabilities.name: sympy_mcp_calculus_operation
capabilities.description: Do calculus operations like diff, integrate, limit, series

capabilities.name: sympy_mcp_equation_operation
capabilities.description: Do symbolic equation operations like solve, solveset, linsolve, nonlinsolve

capabilities.name: sympy_mcp_matrix_operation
capabilities.description: Do symbolic matrix operations like create, det, inv, rref, eigenvals
